name: Reforged Labs
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
long_description:
Reforged Labs is a platform for creating and optimizing video ads for game marketing. We use GenAI and ad intelligence to build and refine video creatives, powering faster experimentation and higher ROAS for game studios

We’re a small and nimble team with backgrounds from Google, Microsoft, and Harvard, and we’re backed by world-class investors, including Y Combinator, the founder of King and Sky Mavis, and executives from Niantic and Pocket Gems.
one_liner: GenAI video ad and creative intelligence platform for game marketing
